summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 FORD F-150. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE POWER STEERING FAILED TO OPERATE AS DESIGNED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE JERKED WHILE DRIVING. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FAILURE OCCURRED AT VARIOUS SPEEDS AND OCCURRED MORE OFTEN OVER TIME. THE SERVICE EPAS WARNING LIGHT WAS ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT CONTACTED A DEALER OR INDEPENDENT MECHANIC. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED NOR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 130,000.
